item.description:
Located at the Junction of Routes 147 & 157 in Middlefield, CT 06455.

This is on Saturday and Sunday. But Saturday is going to snow so Sunday will be better.

Country Breakfast in the Apple Barrel
Sat/Sun, 9am-12 noon

Free Samples -- all you can eat!
Sat/Sun, 10am-6pm

"Under the Seas" Snow & Ice Sculpture Show & Demo
Sat: 10am - 7pm; Sun: 10am - 6pm
Watch Bill Covitz his team of carvers transform 10,000 pounds of ice into a Winter Wonderland Under the Sea, with mermaids, coral reefs, sea turtles, mantarays, and King Neptune on his throne!

Rail Jam Exhibition & Contest
Sat: Noon - 2pm; 4pm - 6pm. Sun: 1pm - 3pm.
Observe the athletic prowess of Connecticut's best skiers and snowboarders performing tricks on a ski jump! Signed waivers required; parental permission required for children under 18 yrs. For more information about participating in the Rail Jam activity, please contact Ski Sundown at 860.379.7669.

Outdoor Food Concessions
Sat/Sun 11am-6pm.
Hotdogs, hamburgers, pulled pork, clam chowder, chili, hot apple crisp, sugar-on-snow, hot spiced cider, and much more!

Fruit Tree Pruning Demonstration
Sat/Sun, 10am - 12noon; in the orchard
Employing correct pruning techniques has a direct impact upon the health and productivity of fruit trees. In this two hour workshop, you will learn special pruning techniques from our experienced orchardists. Hand-out materials are available. There is no charge to attend this demonstration. Register in advance by calling 860.349.6043.

Horse Drawn Wagon Rides
Sat/Sun, 11am-4pm

Connecticut Valley Siberian Husky Club
Sat/Sun, 10am - 4pm
We'll have plenty of snow - enjoy watching mushing demonstrations! Kids love visiting with these affectionate, hard-working dogs! Bring your camera!

Winterfest Sponsor

Visit with life-size ice sculptures of farm animals, every furry detail carved with care by our expert sculptors!

Led by internationally renowned ice carver, Bill Covitz of Cheshire, CT, our professional team of ice carvers will dazzle you with their very cool creations!

Parents, bring your cameras! This event provides priceless photo opportunities and unforgettable winter fun for all!
Support our Corporate Sponsors!
Our Ice Sculpting Show & Demonstration is made possible only by the support of the following Connecticut businesses.
* Follow I-91 South to Exit 20.
* Turn LEFT onto Middle Street.
* Make an immediate LEFT onto Country Club Road.
* Follow Country Club Road for 1.6 miles.
* Turn RIGHT onto Higby Road.
* Higby Road becomes Jackson Hill Road.
* Follow to end, merge with Rte. 157 South.
* Follow approximately one mile.
* Stay on Rte. 157 as it turns RIGHT.
* The entrances to the Apple Barrel and the Golf Club will be on your LEFT.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be loving the ice sculptures. I will e-mail the Yeses

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Lyman Orchard Winter Fest
